sources.subtitle_1: How is your hydration goal calculated?
sources.text_1: We use the information you provide‚Äîsuch as gender, weight, and activity level‚Äîto create a personalized hydration target, tailored specifically to your needs.
sources.subtitle_2: Does alcohol really affect my hydration?
sources.text_2:
Yes, it does. Our app estimates how much water (or any hydrating beverage) you need to drink to counterbalance the dehydration caused by alcohol. 

The hydration percentage on your home screen reflects this. 

Learn more here:
sources.link_2_3: Alcohol's Effect on Urination and Hydration
sources.subtitle_3: How accurate is the BAC (Blood Alcohol Content) calculation?
sources.text_3:
Our BAC estimates are based on the data you provide. 
While individual results may vary, we give you a general estimate of when you‚Äôll be sober. 

NEVER DRINK AND DRIVE! 

Learn more here:
sources.text_4: If you have additional questions, check out our FAQ here:
sources.text_4_2: You can also reach out to us directly at drinkydailydrinktracker@gmail.com. We're happy to help!

tips.tip_1: üíß Start your day right! Drink a glass of water as soon as you wake up to kickstart your metabolism.
tips.tip_2: Stay refreshed! Keep a reusable water bottle with you to sip throughout the day.
tips.tip_3: Did you know? Drinking water can boost your energy levels and keep you feeling alert.
tips.tip_4: Add a slice of lemon üçã to your water for a zesty twist and extra vitamin C!
tips.tip_5: üåø Herbal infusions are a great way to hydrate and enjoy natural flavors without added sugars.
tips.tip_6: Swap your soda for sparkling water to cut down on sugar without sacrificing fizz!
tips.tip_7: Feeling hungry? Sometimes thirst is mistaken for hunger. Try drinking a glass of water first!
tips.tip_8: Stay glowing! Proper hydration keeps your skin looking healthy and radiant ‚ú®.
tips.tip_9: Track your drinks to see how much water you‚Äôre really drinking each day.
tips.tip_10: After a workout, replenish with water to help your muscles recover.
tips.tip_11: Limit alcohol intake üç∑ to stay hydrated and feel your best the next day.
tips.tip_12: Infuse your water with fruits like berries or cucumbers for a tasty hydration boost.
tips.tip_13: Hydration helps improve your concentration and memory. Keep sipping!
tips.tip_14: Did you know? Drinking enough water can aid in digestion and prevent bloating.
tips.tip_15: Remember to hydrate on weekends too! Keep your routine going even when you're relaxing.
tips.tip_16: Cold water can be more refreshing on hot days. Keep it chilled!
tips.tip_17: Replace one sugary drink a day with water and feel the difference.
tips.tip_18: Hydrate before, during, and after drinking alcohol to minimize dehydration effects.
tips.tip_19: Drinking water before bed can help you stay hydrated overnight without waking up thirsty.
tips.tip_20: Stay on top of your game by keeping your hydration levels optimal during work or study.
tips.tip_21: Drinking water can help reduce headaches caused by dehydration.
tips.tip_22: Alcohol can dehydrate you, so pair your drinks with water to keep things balanced and fun! ü•§
tips.tip_23: Alcohol can disrupt your sleep. Stay hydrated to improve your rest quality.
tips.tip_24: Hydration is key for a healthy heart. Keep drinking water! ‚ù§Ô∏è
tips.tip_25: Keep a glass of water by your bed to hydrate first thing in the morning.
tips.tip_26: Track your soda intake and see how much healthier you can feel by cutting back.
tips.tip_27: Stay energized by drinking water instead of reaching for that extra coffee ‚òïÔ∏è.
tips.tip_28: Hydrate while you hustle! Keep water handy during your busiest days.
tips.tip_29: Drinking water can help flush out toxins and keep your body clean.
tips.tip_30: Use our sobriety estimator to plan ahead and stay safe when you drink alcohol.
tips.tip_31: Hydration supports your immune system. Drink up to stay healthy! üõ°Ô∏è
tips.tip_32: Feeling sluggish? A glass of water might be the pick-me-up you need.
tips.tip_33: Track different beverages to get a complete picture of your hydration.
tips.tip_34: Stay cool! Proper hydration helps regulate your body temperature.
tips.tip_35: Drinking water can improve your mood. Keep those good vibes flowing! üòä
tips.tip_36: Set personal hydration challenges and invite friends to join you!
tips.tip_37: Alcohol can lower your hydration levels. Balance with plenty of water.
tips.tip_38: Hydrate before meals to aid digestion and prevent overeating.
tips.tip_39: Keep a tally of your drinks to stay motivated and achieve your hydration goals.
tips.tip_40: Add herbal teas to your hydration routine for variety and extra benefits.
tips.tip_41: Proper hydration can enhance your physical performance during workouts üèãÔ∏è‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è.
tips.tip_42: Track your alcohol intake and see how it affects your hydration levels.
tips.tip_43: Drinking water helps maintain healthy joints and prevents cramps.
tips.tip_44: Use our app‚Äôs hydration tips to discover new ways to stay hydrated every day.
tips.tip_45: Stay sharp! Hydration is essential for cognitive function and focus.
tips.tip_46: Celebrate your water wins with rewards and stay motivated to drink more.
tips.tip_47: Drinking water can help balance your body‚Äôs fluids and support overall health.
tips.tip_48: Keep track of your hydration during different seasons to adjust your intake accordingly.
tips.tip_49: Hydration is a simple step towards a healthier, happier you! Start today üåü.
tips.tip_50: Remember, every sip counts! Stay consistent and make hydration a habit.
